scripts.preinstall: mkdir lib && cd lib && git clone https://github.com/JustinSDK/dotSCAD.git
scripts.kitchenPNG: openscad src/kitchen/_outputKitchen.scad -o output/png/kitchen1.png --imgsize=1920,1200 --camera=1800,1300,0,0,20,0,8000 && openscad src/kitchen/_outputKitchen.scad -o output/png/kitchen2.png --imgsize=1920,1200 --camera=1600,1300,0,0,-20,0,8000 && openscad src/kitchen/_outputKitchen.scad -o output/png/kitchen3.png --imgsize=1920,1200 --camera=2600,1900,0,0,-20,0,3100
